Indigenous languages and literature
Comments(0)
Print Page
  Search: 
 
 

Indigenous languages

The Nyulnyul language of Dampier Land, Western Australia - William B. McGregor
Call Number: CHIFLEY PL7101.N96 M34 2011 [v.1 and v.2]
Publication Date: 2011

The Mathi group of languages - Barry J. Blake ... [et al.]
Call Number: CHIFLEY PL7101.V5 M38 2011
Publication Date: 2011

Re-awakening languages : theory and practice in the revitalisation of Australia's indigenous languages - edited by John Hobson ... [et al.]
Call Number: CHIFLEY PL7002.R4 2010
Publication Date: 2010

Indigenous language and social identity : papers in honour of Michael Walsh - edited by Brett Baker, Ilana Mushin, Mark Harvey and Rod Gardner
Call Number: CHIFLEY P40.5.G762 A855 2010
Publication Date: 2010

Variation in indigenous minority languages - edited by James N. Stanford, Dennis R. Preston
Call Number: CHIFLEY P120.I56 V37 2009
Publication Date: 2009
Also available as an eBook

A handbook of Aboriginal languages of New South Wales and the Australian Capital Territory - Jim Wafer and Amanda Lissarrague with a chapter on contact languages by Jean Harkins
Call Number: CHIFLEY PL7091.N48 W34 2008
Publication Date: 2008

Australian Aboriginal words in English : their origin and meaning - R.M.W. Dixon ... [et al.]
Call Number: CHIFLEY PE3601.D5 2006
Publication Date: 2006

Comments (0)
 

Literature

A companion to Australian Aboriginal literature - edited by Belinda Wheeler
Call Number: eBook
Publication Date: 2013

Macquarie PEN anthology of Aboriginal literature - edited by Anita Heiss and Peter Minter ; general editor: Nicholas Jose
Call Number: CHIFLEY PR9614.5.A94M332 2008
Publication Date: 2008

Black words, white page : Aboriginal literature 1929-1988 - Adam Shoemaker
Call Number: CHIFLEY PR9608.2.A96S46 2004
Publication Date: 2004
Also available as an eBook

Writing never arrives naked : early Aboriginal cultures of writing in Australia - Penny van Toorn
Call Number: MENZIES GN666.V365 2006
Publication Date: 2006
Also available online via Informit Indigenous Collection

It just lies there from the beginning : Aboriginal stories and poems from the Top End - Marjorie Bil Bil
Call Number: CHIFLEY PR9608.2.A96I8 1995
Publication Date: 1995

Babaru : stories - B. Wongar
Call Number: CHIFLEY PR9619.3.W62B3 1991
Publication Date: 1991

Paperbark : a collection of Black Australian writings - edited by Jack Davis ... [et al.]
Call Number: CHIFLEY PR9614.5.A94D37 1990
Publication Date: 1990

Us fellas : an anthology of Aboriginal writing - collected by Colleen Glass and Archie Weller
Call Number: CHIFLEY PR9608.2.A88U8 1987
Publication Date: 1987

Comments (0)
 

Fiction

The oldest song in the world - Sue Woolfe
Call Number: CHIFLEY PR9619.3.W65 O438 2012
Publication Date: 2012

Purple threads - Jeanine Leane
Call Number: CHIFLEY PR9619.4.L43 2011
Publication Date: 2011
Winner of the 2010 David Unaipon Award for Indigenous Writing

The lieutenant - Kate Grenville
Call Number: CHIFLEY PR9619.3.G73L52 2008
Publication Date: 2008

That deadman dance - Kim Scott
Call Number: CHIFLEY PR9619.3.S373 T49 2010
Publication Date: 2010

Skins - Sarah Hay
Call Number: MENZIES rare book +2429595
Publication Date: 2002
Winner, The Australian/Vogel Literary Award

Rabbit-proof fence - Doris Pilkington (Nugi Garimara)
Call Number: CHIFLEY PR9619.3.P535 R33 2002
Publication Date: 2002

The promised land - Mudrooroo
Call Number: CHIFLEY PR9619.3.N32P7 2000
Publication Date: 2000

Comments (0)
